home.description: Authentic Ukrainian cuisine in Oakville. Fresh ingredients, homemade flavours.
home.heroTagline: The name ColorEat is inspired by the Ukrainian word "колорит", which stands for warmth, authenticity, and the character of our heritage.
home.heroSubtagline: We created this restaurant to share the colours and comfort of Ukrainian home cooking with our guests. Here, every meal feels like family.

menu.description: Full menu of ColorEat Cafe — Ukrainian cuisine in Oakville. Appetizers, soups, main courses, crêpes, drinks, and catering.
menu.title: Our Menu
menu.allergyNotice: Please inform your server about any allergies or dietary restrictions
